data.name: Red Embrace: Hollywood - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Red Embrace: Hollywood 15-track OST, composed by Murcielo with an additional track by Patrick Wailes!

The OST contains almost 60 minutes of in-game music, with 15 tracks in MP3 format.
data.about_the_game:
The Red Embrace: Hollywood 15-track OST, composed by Murcielo with an additional track by Patrick Wailes!

The OST contains almost 60 minutes of in-game music, with 15 tracks in MP3 format.
data.short_description: The full 15-track OST of Red Embrace: Hollywood!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
